name: Instacrops
headline: Helping farmers maximize crop yield
description:
Instacrops is a simple dashboard that helps farmers maximize their crop yield. 

We give farmers IoT sensors to put in their field. We combine that data with satellite and drone data to provide analytics on the health of their farms. Farmers use this to increase their crops yield by 12% on average. 

We‚Äôre live on 300+ farms across Latam and have reached more than $200.000 in monthly revenue, growing 2X YoY. 

There‚Äôs 2.9 billion acres of farmland in Latin America which makes this a $50 billion market.

We‚Äôre instacrops. We‚Äôre bringing data driven decisions to farmers worldwide

founders.name: Mario Bustamante, Founder
founders.description: As an electronics engineer with 10+ years of experience, I developed personalized IoT devices selling 11,000+ units which led to my first exit. I sold my first startup to one of the top retailers in LATAM. Inspired by my girlfriend, a farmer and agronomist, I became passionate about helping farmers make better decisions. Today, with Instacrops, we are operating in 350+ farms wondering how to improve the food production with Software and AI reducing food security risks

## ABOUT US
Instacrops is a virtual crop advisor that, through an artificial intelligence-based application, detects irrigation, nutrient, pest, and disease issues, enabling real-time monitoring of fields.
Our mission is to keep farmers informed about their crops‚Äô needs, empowering them to make timely decisions that optimize resource usage and maximize crop yield.
Ready to transform your crops and maximize your production? Join Instacrops today and take the first step towards more efficient and profitable agriculture! üåüüå±
[Contact us!](https://www.instacrops.com/<#contact>)
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Instacrops-cuadrada.png)
## OUR TECHNOLOGY DETECTS IRRIGATION PROBLEMS, NUTRIENTS, PESTS AND DISEASES.
## WHAT WE LOVE TO DO 
###### Big Data and virtual assistance
Our efficient water replacement model is powered by Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning and expert advisors who will help you improve the productive potential of your crop. We have a team of IT agronomists who will be your advisors.
###### Plug & Play technology
We are constantly improving our Hardware to facilitate installation processes, wherever you are. Our IoT devices are Plug & Play and we are able to manage health status in real time.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Software-y-Hardware-ingl√©s.png)
###### Research and continuous development
We work closely with our clients and applied Research and Development institutions to generate new solutions based on predictive models to anticipate problems.
###### Remote monitoring and control 
We measure, process and interpret parameters of climate, soil moisture, irrigation system and plants conditions in any type of crop, whether specialty or row.
[TRY A DEMO](https://www.instacrops.com/<#contact>)
## OUR SERVICES
[ ![INSTAFROST ‚Äì NEW SERVICE!](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Portada-1-400x284.png) ](https://www.instacrops.com/<https:/www.instacrops.com/en/project/instafrost-new-service/> "INSTAFROST ‚Äì NEW SERVICE!")

## [CROP ADVISOR](https://www.instacrops.com/<https:/www.instacrops.com/en/project/crop-advisor-2/> "CROP ADVISOR")
# GET FIELD INSIGHTS THROUGH SATELLITE IMAGES WITH SKYCROPS
### You‚Äôll have access to 4 vegetation indices
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/NDVI-2-1.png)
#### NDVI - Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
This index is widely used in agriculture and is employed to assess the crop‚Äôs health status and biomass.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/NDWI.png)
#### NDWI - Normalized Difference Water Index
Is an index for delineating and monitoring content changes in surface water, enabling the measurement of soil moisture content.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/SAVI-1.png)
#### SAVI - Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index
Used for analyzing young crops or regions with sparse vegetation, this indicator minimizes soil brightness influences through a correction factor.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/gNDVI-2.png)
#### gNDVI - Green Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
Estimates photosynthetic activity, providing insights into water and nitrogen consumption in vegetation cover.
[TRY A DEMO](https://www.instacrops.com/<#contact>)
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/drone-768x597.png)
# ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)
Our company strives to take advantage of the state of the art in image processing and artificial intelligence by making them available to farmers around the world.
Our stations collect minute-by-minute data of the entire crop, integrating leading sensorization and remote sensing technologies, which allows us to develop software-based technology to monitor crops, soil health and improve water efficiency.
Being one of the companies that will lead this revolution, we have an incredible team and we are attracting great interest and support from clients and investors alike.
## CUSTOMERS

## CROP ADVISOR‚ü®26‚ü©
# GET FIELD INSIGHTS THROUGH SATELLITE IMAGES WITH SKYCROPS
### You‚Äôll have access to 4 vegetation indices
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/NDVI-2-1.png)
#### NDVI - Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
This index is widely used in agriculture and is employed to assess the crop‚Äôs health status and biomass.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/NDWI.png)
#### NDWI - Normalized Difference Water Index
Is an index for delineating and monitoring content changes in surface water, enabling the measurement of soil moisture content.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/SAVI-1.png)
#### SAVI - Soil-Adjusted Vegetation Index
Used for analyzing young crops or regions with sparse vegetation, this indicator minimizes soil brightness influences through a correction factor.
![](https://www.instacrops.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/gNDVI-2.png)
#### gNDVI - Green Normalized Difference Vegetation Index
Estimates photosynthetic activity, providing insights into water and nitrogen consumption in vegetation cover.

# ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI)
Our company strives to take advantage of the state of the art in image processing and artificial intelligence by making them available to farmers around the world.
Our stations collect minute-by-minute data of the entire crop, integrating leading sensorization and remote sensing technologies, which allows us to develop software-based technology to monitor crops, soil health and improve water efficiency.

generated_description:
### Instacrops: Empowering Farmers with Data-Driven Agriculture

**Mission**: Instacrops is all about helping farmers maximize their crop yields. They started with a simple idea: a dashboard to provide farmers with tools and insights for better crop management.

Founded in **2014** and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Instacrops is based in **Santiago, Chile**. Their team has grown to **34 employees**, and they‚Äôve made significant strides in the agriculture sector across **300+ farms** in Latin America. They're not just a startup; they have established a monthly revenue of over **$200,000**, showing a stellar **2X year-over-year growth**.

#### What They Do

Instacrops equips farmers with **IoT sensors** that gather data from their fields and combine it with satellite and drone insights. This blend of technology allows for comprehensive analytics on crop health, enabling farmers to increase their yield by an average of **12%**.

Their platform gives real-time recommendations for irrigation, nutrients, pest control, and disease detection, effectively acting as a virtual agricultural advisor. Farmers can monitor conditions such as soil moisture and climate, all while having access to cutting-edge technology that requires minimal installation effort‚Äîit's **Plug & Play**.

#### The Market

With **2.9 billion** acres of farmland in Latin America, Instacrops is sitting on the edge of an enormous **$50 billion market**. By honing in on sustainable agriculture practices with their IoT and AI solutions, they are at the forefront of revolutionizing how farming is done.

#### Key Technologies and Services

1. **IoT Sensors**: Monitor on-field conditions for precision agriculture.
2. **Satellite & Drone Data**: Provide insights into large-scale environmental changes.
3. **AI-Powered Insights**: Optimize resource usage based on predictive analytics.
4. **Remote Monitoring**: Enable continuous oversight of crop health and environmental factors.

#### Impact and Future

Instacrops has already saved over **5 billion liters of water** and connected more than **70,000 acres** of farmland to their network. As they continue to innovate, the goal is to empower more farmers to make data-driven decisions, enhancing productivity while fostering sustainability in agriculture.

For more information or to join the agricultural tech revolution, you can check out their website: [Instacrops](https://www.instacrops.com).

Their tagline? ‚ÄúBringing data-driven decisions to farmers worldwide.‚Äù If you‚Äôre in agriculture and looking to up your yield game, Instacrops just might be what you need.
